structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.catch_line: Unregistered person not to hold himself out as registered environmental health specialist.
law.text: No person not registered under the provisions of this chapter shall hold himself out as a registered environmental health specialist nor append to his name the initials "E.H.S." or "R.S.".
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 309, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1960.
